question: [Detailed] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (126, 170), (117, 71), (201, 110).

qas.question: [Detailed] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (126, 170), (117, 71), (201, 110).
[Practice] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (126, 170), (117, 71), (201, 110). Provide only the area.
[Focus] Nederlands: Bepaal oppervlakte en omtrek van de driehoek met punten (126, 170), (117, 71), (201, 110). Provide only the perimeter.
